template.name: appmanager
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 application manager. This API allows widgets to access and launch applications.

template.name: calendar
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 calendar service. This API allows widgets to access, create, and manage calendars and calendar entries.

template.name: contact
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 contacts service. This API allows widgets to access and manage information about contacts.

template.name: landmarks
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 landmarks service. This API allows widgets to access and manage information about landmarks and landmark categories. The information is stored in one or more landmark databases on a device.

template.name: location
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 location service. This API allows widgets to retrieve information about the geographic location of the device and to perform location-based calculations.

template.name: logging
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 logging service. This API allows widgets to access and manage logging events such as call logs, messaging logs, and data logs.

template.name: media
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 media management service. This API allows widgets to retrieve information about the media files stored in the device's public folders.

template.name: messaging
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 messaging service. This API allows widgets to send, retrieve, and manage messages using the Message Store.

template.name: sensor
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 sensors API. This API allows widgets to access data provided by the physical sensors of the device.

template.name: sensor
template.description: Access WRT 1.1 system information API. This API allows widgets to access system data like battery, connectivity, device, display, features, general, memory, network
